sense.def:
Kar je
relevant
, je povezano s tistim, o čemer govorimo ali pišemo.

seg.quote: This is not strictly relevant to what I'll be saying.
She did not understand the relevance of his remarks.

sense.def:
Stvar, ki je v določeni vrsti
relevant
, je prava ali primerna.

seg.quote: They are made to conform with the relevant British Standards.
